properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 8:29AM CST until February 23 at 11:32PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Mississippi...

Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County
Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Chickasawhay River At Enterprise
* from this evening to Sunday evening.
* At  8:00 AM Thursday the stage was 16.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this evening and
will continue to rise to near 29.9 feet early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 30.0 feet...Water begins to cover several streets and
roads.
* Impact...At 25.0 feet...Water begins to overflow banks from the
confluence of Chunky River and Okatibbee Creek to approximately 3
miles downstream.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours. Rainfall
amounts greater than forecast may take the rivers higher.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
